specification.name: JSR 346: Contexts and Dependency Injection for Java EE 1.1

assertion.text: A bean comprises of a (nonempty) set of bean types.
A bean comprises of a (nonempty) set of qualifiers.
A bean comprises of a scope.
A bean comprises of an optional bean EL name.
A bean comprises of a set of interceptor bindings.
assertion.note: This may only be tested indirectly

assertion.text: A bean comprises of a bean implementation.
A bean may or may not be an alternative.

section.title: Functionality provided by the container to the bean

assertion.text: A bean may have multiple bean types.
All beans have the bean type |java.lang.Object|.
